Lyric:
[by:Karlek]
[ti:like that]
[ar:rytmeklubben]
[al:like that]
[by:karlek]
[00:11.31]Why say it, please don't kill the fire
[00:16.67]Don't make me wanna cut the wire
[00:22.31]There's something about you
[00:27.66]And these things that we do
[00:44.62]Don't tell me that you want me
[00:46.87]'Cause I don't want you like that
[00:50.03]Don't tell me that you love me
[00:52.47]'Cause I can't say it back
[00:55.46]I don't know what it feels like
[00:58.02]And you know that it feels right
[01:01.32]Don't tell me that you want me
[01:03.87]'Cause I don't want you like that
[01:06.88]I doubt it if we don't decide it
[01:12.43]Don't really like to think about it
[01:18.02]'Cause there's something about you
[01:23.36]And these things that we do
[01:29.20]Don't tell me that you want me
[01:31.62]'Cause I don't want you like that
[01:34.72]Don't tell me that you love me
[01:37.23]'Cause I can't say it back
[01:40.07]I don't know what it feels like
[01:42.83]And you know that it feels right
[01:45.96]Don't tell me that you want me
[01:48.41]'Cause I don't want you like that
[01:51.44]We both know you want this more than I do
[01:56.74]But even though you need me more than I need you
[02:02.42]Doesn't mean my heart won't skip a beat
[02:06.96]When I'm with you and when you're looking at me like that
[02:13.90]Don't tell me that you want me
[02:16.42]'Cause I don't want you like that
[02:19.43]Don't tell me that you love me
[02:21.92]'Cause I can't say it back
[02:24.71]I don't know what it feels like
[02:27.38]And you know that it feels right
[02:30.58]Don't tell me that you want me
[02:32.97]'Cause I don't want you like that
[02:47.21]I don't know what it feels like
[02:49.66]And you know that it feels right
[02:52.80]Don't tell me that you want me
[02:55.24]'Cause I don't want you like that
